title: Vedic (Hindu) Calendar
source: Panchāngam lunisolar structure with Vikram Samvat era, 12 months, 27 nakshatras, and 6 Ritus.
notes: Hindu lunisolar calendar starting from Chaitra (March/April).
Months based on moon cycles. Adhika-masa (intercalary month) added ~every 32.5 months.
Six seasons (Ritus): Vasanta, Grishma, Varsha, Sharad, Hemanta, Shishira.
